languages.text: {n}Взвесив ваше — бывшее ваше — оружие в ладони, мутант довольно ухмыляется.{/n} "Хорошая штука". {n}Подняв на вас удивленный взгляд, он мрачно добавляет:{/n} "А ты что, все еще здесь? А ну проваливай".

{n}The mutant weighs your weapon — or rather, the weapon that used to be yours — in his hand and grins.{/n} "Nice." {n}He looks up at you in surprise and adds sullenly,{/n} "What, you're still here? Get lost!"
languages.original_text: {n}Взвесив ваше — бывшее ваше — оружие в ладони, мутант довольно ухмыляется.{/n} "Хорошая штука". {n}Подняв на вас удивленный взгляд, он мрачно добавляет:{/n} "А ты что, все еще здесь? А ну проваливай".

traits.locale_text: {n}The mutant weighs your weapon — or rather, the weapon that used to be yours — in his hand and grins.{/n} "Nice." {n}He looks up at you in surprise and adds sullenly,{/n} "What, you're still here? Get lost."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}変異体はあなたの武器を、いや、あなたの武器だったものを手に取り、ニヤリと笑った。{/n}「いいね」{n}彼は驚いてこちらを見上げ、不機嫌そうにこう付け加えた。{/n}「まだいたのか？失せろ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant weighs your weapon — or rather, the weapon that used to be yours — in his hand and grins.{/n} "Nice." {n}He looks up at you in surprise and adds sullenly,{/n} "What, you're still here? Get lost!"

traits.locale_text: {n}変異体はあなたの武器を、いや、あなたの武器だったものを手に取り、ニヤリと笑った。{/n}「いいね」{n}彼は驚いてこちらを見上げ、不機嫌そうにこう付け加えた。{/n}「まだいたのか？失せろ！」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}变种人掂了掂你的武器，或者更确切地说，是他的武器，随后笑了起来。{/n}“真不错。”{n}随后，他惊讶地抬头看着你，以阴沉的声音开了口。{/n}“我说，你怎么还在这儿？快滚！”
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant weighs your weapon — or rather, the weapon that used to be yours — in his hand and grins.{/n} "Nice." {n}He looks up at you in surprise and adds sullenly,{/n} "What, you're still here? Get lost!"

traits.locale_text: {n}变种人掂了掂你的武器，或者更确切地说，是他的武器，随后笑了起来。{/n}“真不错。”{n}随后，他惊讶地抬头看着你，以阴沉的声音开了口。{/n}“我说，你怎么还在这儿？快滚！”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}El mutante pesa tu arma, ahora suya, en su mano y sonríe.{/n} «Muy bien». {n}Te mira sorprendido y añade de mal humor:{/n} «¿Qué, sigue aquí? ¡Piérdase!».
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant weighs your weapon — or rather, the weapon that used to be yours — in his hand and grins.{/n} "Nice." {n}He looks up at you in surprise and adds sullenly,{/n} "What, you're still here? Get lost!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El mutante pesa tu arma, ahora suya, en su mano y sonríe.{/n} «Muy bien». {n}Te mira sorprendido y añade de mal humor:{/n} «¿Qué, sigue aquí? ¡Piérdase!».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Der Mutant betrachtet deine Waffe in seiner Hand — oder besser gesagt deine frühere Waffe — und grinst.{/n} "Nett." {n}Er blickt überrascht zu dir auf und fügt mürrisch hinzu:{/n} "Seid Ihr etwa immer noch hier? Verpisst Euch!"
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant weighs your weapon — or rather, the weapon that used to be yours — in his hand and grins.{/n} "Nice." {n}He looks up at you in surprise and adds sullenly,{/n} "What, you're still here? Get lost!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mutant betrachtet deine Waffe in seiner Hand — oder besser gesagt deine frühere Waffe — und grinst.{/n} "Nett." {n}Er blickt überrascht zu dir auf und fügt mürrisch hinzu:{/n} "Seid Ihr etwa immer noch hier? Verpisst Euch!"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Le mutant soupèse votre arme, ou plutôt, l'arme qui était la vôtre, puis sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « Pas mal. » {n}Il lève les yeux vers vous, l'air surpris, et ajoute brusquement :{/n} « Quoi, vous êtes encore là ? Foutez-moi le camp ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant weighs your weapon — or rather, the weapon that used to be yours — in his hand and grins.{/n} "Nice." {n}He looks up at you in surprise and adds sullenly,{/n} "What, you're still here? Get lost!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mutant soupèse votre arme, ou plutôt, l'arme qui était la vôtre, puis sourit de toutes ses dents.{/n} « Pas mal. » {n}Il lève les yeux vers vous, l'air surpris, et ajoute brusquement :{/n} « Quoi, vous êtes encore là ? Foutez-moi le camp ! »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Mutant, silahını... Daha doğrusu eskiden sana ait olan silahı eline alıp tartıyor ve gülümsüyor.{/n} "Hoş." {n}Şaşırarak sana bakıyor ve asık bir suratla konuşuyor.{/n} "Hâlâ burada mısın sen? Kaybol!"
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant weighs your weapon — or rather, the weapon that used to be yours — in his hand and grins.{/n} "Nice." {n}He looks up at you in surprise and adds sullenly,{/n} "What, you're still here? Get lost!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mutant, silahını yani eskiden sana ait olan silahı eline alıp tartıyor ve gülümsüyor.{/n} "Hoş." {n}Şaşırarak sana bakıyor ve asık bir suratla konuşuyor.{/n} "Hâlâ burada mısın sen? Kaybol!"
traits.speaker: TrampMain
